story:
*眾籌項目中文版本請持續往下滑

Issues

How many reusable cups sits around your home not being used? The fact is, most people who have reusable cups often forget them at home, or consider bringing a reusable cup around all day “inconvenient”.

We understand the struggle, and we don’t want you to give up.

With CupRite, you don’t need to remember to bring a cup on your everyday coffee run. With CupRite rentable cup, you would enjoy a pay-and-go convenience of the 21st century while making a positive impact on the environment by skipping on single-use cups. Reusable cups are designed for reuse. CupRite strives to make them a viable option and reuse them to their maximum potential.

 

 

How it Works

We partner with cafes and other beverage shops by providing them with our reusable cups. Through the CupRite app, customers can

  • locate a participating shop
  • rent a reusable cup and enjoy the drink on-the-go
  • return the dirty cup to any participating shop within 15 days 

The cups are collected and cleaned by the participating cafes. You can also track your usage history through the app and get a better understanding of the impacts you have created. 

 

Features

Once you become a CupRite monthly subscriber for only $3.99 per month (cost of a cup of coffee), you get to enjoy:

  • Discount every time (make your money back by using CupRite 7 - 12 times a month!)
  • Unlimited reusable cups every month (and lids)
  • Easily create a positive impact for the environment

If you are a cafe owner and would like to partner with us, you get to enjoy:

  • Free advertisement on the app 
  • Unlimited, FREE reusable cups to cut down on that recurring procurement cost on disposables
  • Easily create a positive impact for the environment

Also, our cups are made of stainless steel, one of the most durable materials. CupRite's stainless steel cups

  • Last for a lifetime
  • Safe for your drink - toxic chemicals are commonly found in plastic or plastic lined paper containers, not to mention that they are often holding hot drinks!
  • Easy to clean and maintain

If 1 in 10 Americans is a CupRite Subscriber, approximately 10 billion disposable cups would be saved from landfills or the ocean in just a year! Join us in protecting the earth.

 

 

 

Our Story

 

About Us

Winnie (B.S. in environmental science) and Gloria (M.S. in statistic) are two young activists who are deeply concerned about the state of the environment. We have done a lot in terms of minimizing our personal impacts, but it never felt enough. Given the current political climate in terms of environmental policy, we feel the urge to bring about change, to unite people, to help others protect our beloved environment. This is when CupRite was born. Our team combines passion, brain, and technology to reimagine the future.

 

Timeline

 

Testimonials

 

 

Our Goals

We have launched a test run in Orange, CA at the end of 2018. We are more than thrilled to hear the constructive feedback from customers and everyone else. We also realized areas for improvement. One of the main issues is the rent/return process. An easy-to-use app will significantly speed up the process and bring more value, such as gathering an online zero-waste community. As of now, our cups can only serve cold beverages. We are looking to upgrade our cups, so you can get hot drinks as well. 

In order to achieve our goals and create more impacts, we need your support!

Select a perk when you contribute a set amount to our cause. Otherwise, contribute in any amount. If neither options is right for you, spreading the word on social media or telling others about us would also be greatly appreciated! 

Perks

 

Moving Forward

We believe that people should have easy access to sustainable, eco-conscious choices, as simple as having a reusable cup handy. Ideally, CupRite reusables would replace most of the single-use products out there!

We feel right about starting our network in California given the state's plan to phase out single-use products by 2030, and it being the most populous state in the US.

We are more than excited for a future with a Reusable Revolution in EVERY CORNER OF THE WORLD. With your support, we will be able to connect to a much wider audience and even develop a reusable container vending machine. We welcome and look forward to revolutionizing the to-go lifestyle with you!

 

——以下是中文版本——

*Scroll up for English version

概要

記得那個星巴克門前堆滿一次性杯子的垃圾桶嗎？想要知道什麼方法可以改善這個情況嗎？CupRite Inc 提供環保杯具租賃系統，讓你隨時在合作的飲料店內無限租用與歸還可重複使用不鏽鋼杯。CupRite會員可以在享受便利的同時保護環境，再加上享受飲料店的CupRite獨家折扣。

問題

其實大部分人的家中都擁有幾個可重複使用的旅行杯，只是旅行杯要隨身攜帶非常麻煩。不但要洗，要攜重，還要小心不讓杯內飲料漏出。

可棄一次性杯給予便利，但同時也給環境載上了很多負擔。據統計，超過2萬億個一次性杯在過去30年被使用和棄置於到堆填區和海洋中；垃圾杯數量現時全球每年再增加5千億。這些紙杯中有一層膠膜，所以它們與塑膠杯一般，不能被真正分解。在自然環境中，塑膠會慢慢變成肉眼看不見的微膠粒，通過食物(大部分海鮮)和空氣，最終流回到我們的身體。

 

使用方法

CupRite與咖啡館和其他飲料店合作，為外賣客人提供可重複使用杯。通過CupRite應用程序，用戶可以

  • 尋找參與的商店
  • 租借可重複使用杯，隨時隨地享用飲品
  • 在15天內把髒杯子送回任何合作商店

杯子由合作咖啡館與飲料店收集和清潔。您可以通過應用程序查詢杯子使用歷史記錄，並更好地了解您為環境保育所產生的影響。

 

特色

每個月只要美金$3.99，CupRite會員就可以享受以下福利：

  • 可享受飲料店內提供的CupRite獨家折扣 （一個月用7 - 12次就賺回來了！）
  • 每個月內無限使用CupRite環保杯具租賃服務
  • App內提供的環保生活小資訊
  • 輕鬆在享受便利的同時為環境出一分力

CupRite杯子由不鏽鋼製作。


不鏽鋼是食物容器中最耐用的材料之一：100%可回收，容易清洗，加上安全 - 遇熱時也不會與塑膠一般，散發有毒物質。

 

 

關於我們

來自香港的Winnie在中學時期已經開始關注環保，嘗試在日常生活中減少浪費。她大學時在加州橙縣的查普曼大學念書，專修環境科學和政策。畢業後，深信可以通過自己的知識和力量令更多人參與保護環境的行動，她與Gloria創辦了CupRite。

Gloria來自中國廣州。她在洛杉磯南加州大學讀書的時候，慢慢意識到環境問題的嚴重，進而開始減少使用一次性產品，實行零浪費生活。

作為地球的一分子，我們深信要為現時嚴峻的環境問題出一分力。而且，在幫助每一個人保護環境的同時，還要保留以往習慣的便利。CupRite應運而生。最後的團隊加上在南加州大學念計算機工程的Sharon，三人為CupRite結合了熱誠，創新想法和技能，為一次性垃圾問題提供一個環保又便利的解決方案。

 

公司歷史概要

2018 5月

  • 兩位創辦人確定了CupRite最早的理念

2018 7月

  • 請教專業指導，進行市場調查，購入設備，聯絡利益相關者

2018 11月26號

  • 與位於加州橙縣咖啡廳Contra Cofee & Tea及另外幾家店家合作，開始第一個短期使用；收集並分析數據

2019 2月3號

  • 結束第一個短期使用，改變公司營業模式

2019 3月25號

  • 在Indiegogo.com上開始第一個眾籌項目

2019 5月4號

  • 結束第一個眾籌項目；決定下一步

 

眾籌項目目標

經過2018年底的第一次短期試用後，我們意識到需要改進的地方，特別是CupRite系統內緩慢的流程。Indiegogo是美國一個最大的眾籌項目網站。希望通過這個眾籌集資項目，我們可以收到足夠資金，建立一個APP以提高租借與歸還流程的效率，並利用剩餘的錢購入可以隔熱的不鏽鋼杯。

(目前CupRite不鏽鋼杯只能供給冷飲使用。)

您的任何一份支持和建議都會是對我們(和地球)很大的幫助。為了報答您的捐贈，我們準備了一些禮品 -- 請點擊網頁右邊您想要的捐贈款項與對應禮品。要是沒有你心儀的款項／禮品， 在社交媒體上提及CupRite，告知親朋好友，也是對我們很重要的支持。

禮品大概

*任何超過$10美元的禮品都可以送到美國以外的地區。
*所有禮物會在項目結束後發出。項目結束前，您隨時可以選擇退回捐贈款項。

 

未來發展

我們相信每個人都應該能夠輕鬆享用環保的選擇，就如使用不鏽鋼旅行杯一樣簡單。我們希望CupRite的可重複使用產品能於不久的將來取代市場上大部分一次性產品。

加州計劃在2030年前逐步淘汰所有一次性產品。因此我們認為在此開建CupRite的可重複使用網絡最為理想。

有了您的支持，我們將能夠與更廣泛的人群建立聯繫，甚至開發可重複使用餐具和容器的自動販賣機。CupRite期待與您共同改變社會，為地球出一分力！

story:
The potential impacts of growth on the environment, along with factors such as global climate change, have become particularly hot topics within the travel and tourism industry today. In order to launch our idea as a Startup enterprise we examined the relationship between the governing principles of Green tourism and environment protection, along with predictable trends in the future. 

The PureBalaton Eco Resort concept consists of 12 gorgeous thatched-roof residences and they are intended to open during the Summer of 2018. Each of the Eco residences will be a one-story structure with a small swimming pool located on the terrace. The living area will consist of six to eight beds, a living room, small kitchen and bath area. Within the resort, the main building will be placed facing a private lake and it will facilitate all common services like reception, restaurant, cafeteria and lobby. The Eco residences will feature excellent views of the surrounding landscape, including the charming turquoise lake Balaton. The parking area will be covered with solar panels serving as the energy supply of the Eco Resort. 

The PureBalaton Eco Resort is designed to put visitors in direct contact with nature by minimizing both the visual and environmental impact on the landscape with low-profile structures. 

We will accomplish a Green operation program and Green  purchasing policy to save as much as waste and energy is possible applying the current innovation.

We will combine the highest standards of hospitality, smart technologies, renewable energy sources to reach sustainable zero carbon emission operations with an affordable luxury guest experience. We will design and develop the first self-managing hotel system for various operations, which will serve our guests' convenience and greatly reduce energy consumption.

As global trends are trickling into the hospitality industry the smart technologies, mobile apps, ultra-personalized services and self-managing systems become essential. The concept of luxury seems to revise itself as exclusivity becomes fashionable. However the availability of new information technology not only allows for convenience, but it also helps in the optimization of energy consumption, which is an important factor for an Eco Resort such as PureBalaton. Thus some global trends allowed by advanced technologies may play together well with environment-friendly practices.

 

Garden guide system - The Interactive Botanical Garden

The people use traditional navigational signs for their everyday routes like roads, traffic signs, buildings, different maps. Today we have an easy way to get from A point to B point because the traditional signs and SMART tools help us. We feel safe when traveling and during navigation. But how do we feel our self in the nature? Without the conventional navigational signs? Most of us feel lost and uncomfortable, isn’t it?
We have the knowledge for keeping the people feel safe when they are in nature far from the ordinary navigational signs. And more... Our idea supports our safety and give information about the nature surrounds us.

 

There are only a few option exists for real Zero-Carbon hotels when they choose a management system for its operation. These game changer hotels seriously consider emerging technologies like SMART tools, mobile, IoT, assets collaboration, big data should, predictive operation, energy management but these functions mostly missing from the current management systems. Now it is time to develop a new supporting tool, a totally new infrastructure for Zero-Carbon Eco hotels because these enabling green technologies can give us more advantages when collaboration each-other, operating on the highest level of synergies.

Pursuing green practices in a hotel operation is a win-win situation because we can reduce operational costs while also reducing harmful impacts on the environment.

According to our expectations and reports illustrated in the topic

  • Energy and water consumption costs may be reduced by more than 30 %
  • Carbon emission may be reduced by 35% due to the available and currently applied green technologies moreover implementing 14 ha (34 ac) botanical garden - can absorb 176 ton (388 th lb) Carbon Dioxide -  we can achieve carbon neutral operation; more info: http://www.purebalaton.com/project/market-overview
  • Waste water disposal costs can be decreased around 40 %
  • Solid waste will reduce significantly by 70% thanks to local purchase concept
  • Staff motivation, employee retention and community relations will be improved
  • We may benefit from higher customer loyalty
  • Gaining competitive advantage by being a leader in the sector, increased brand value

We imagine PureBalaton Eco Resort enveloped by trees and flowers in their beautiful wild habitat, our guests directly connected to the beauty and wilderness. The preservation of the diversity of species is our mutual benefit and concern. Mankind is only able to maintain its survival as an elemental part of a healthy and sustainable ecosystem. Unfortunately according to the current standings many parts of the ecosystem have been perniciously damaged and only human provision and care can restore the ecosystem to its original state, in addition to protecting the environment from the extinction of further species. More info: http://www.purebalaton.com/project/botanical-ga...

The botanical garden of PureBalaton Eco Resort will be a micro environment where we can do something to impede the extinction of endangered plant species, along with conserving all other indigenous species. We invite our future guests and all our benefactors to be part of this mission and journey of conservation and restoration. Following we will describe the importance of conserving the diversity of species along with the endangered individual species. Our goal is to constitute and sustain a widespread environmental balance. 

As one of the basic pillars of our Eco Resort plan, our aim is to join the BGCI (Botanic Gardens Conservation International) and local seed saving programs, who support the development and implementation of the GSPC (Global Strategy for Plant Conservation) at a global, regional, national and local level. 
 

Seed protection system
The protection of our future Eco systems is our top priority so we suggest to create a worldwide coordination support systems for endangered species and their seeds. Affiliated to this system can allow for entities to collect, share and operate the seed protection tasks.

PureBalaton is a project which was launched in 2016 (you can find more info here http://www.purebalaton.com/project/). Our mission is to foster a unique brand of ecotourism that exposes international visitors, parents and children alike, to the natural wonders of Lake Balaton in the form of a profitable business that practices the principles of sustainable development. PureBalaton intends to position itself as a zero carbon hotel with innovative architecture, operating with high standards of Eco-friendly technologies, and offering ultra-personalized choices for millennials and older generations alike. We will combine the highest standards, smart technologies and renewable energy sources to gain sustainable zero-carbon emission operation with an affordable luxury guest experience. In addition, we also want to focus on conserving the surrounding environment by saving threatened plants in our own Botanical Garden.

Lake Balaton (often referred as ’The Hungarian See’) is the largest freshwater lake in Central Europe, and one of Hungary's foremost tourist destinations. The mountainous region of the northern shore is known both for its historic character and as a major wine region, while the flat southern shore is known for its resort towns. We plan to implement PureBalaton Eco Resort close to Hévíz city which is situated near to Balaton and the home to one of the largest (4,4 hectares) thermal lake in the world. More info about the destination: http://www.purebalaton.com/project/destination

The necessary funding for a successful outcome in the current phase of our project is $50,000. This amount will cover all expenses needed for solid groundwork. In order to get investor funds and allow for successful implementation of the PureBalaton Eco Resort project we need an accurate financial, environmental and technical plan. 

This amount will cover and include:

  • the time period between November 2016 and June 2017
  • contract with hospitality consultants to elaborate a feasibility study, compile financial plans and conduct research;
  • contract with building consultants to produce technical designs and blueprints, and to elaborate the zero-carbon design;
  • contract with environmental experts to develop a list of locally threatened plants and a conservation strategy along with a sustainability strategy to achieve green hotel certifications;
  • contract with recycling designers to establish stylish and elegant interior designs
  • contract with financial advisers to compile a business plan, investment proposal and pitch presentation.

If we fall short
The current phase includes strategies, studies and plans in 10 different topics. Once this campaign contributes less than targeted amount, we will carry out sub-tasks and parallel continue to get the necessary funds for future functions. We believe in this project is a niche in hotel business.
If we get more
We have the estimation for the entire project and prepared the preliminary financial calculations. We developed more financial scenarios for this campaign. In order to create the plan, the blueprint and feasibility study, what is the basic scenario, we need minimum of $50k. If we get more we will start to execute next milestone with related tasks and aims. We will provide full transparency of spending, monitor the project and provide monthly feedback for our backers. Higher amount of funds will accelerate the project and allow us to execute our plans without 3rd party investors. 

The concept development of an Eco Resort like PureBalaton is a complex process. Among many things it involves an inspiring vision, painstaking attention to detail, world-class expertise in various areas, the forging of effective partnerships, and careful consultation with stakeholders.

We are at the very beginning of the project and this means that by donating your hard earned money to PureBalaton, you'll give us your vote to our idea, which means you are showing your support for Eco Resort combined with Botanical Garden. This project intends to protect the environment in a unique way. We developed a special combination of the green and SMART technologies for building and operating real Zero-Carbon Eco hotels, and we recognized it can achieve its aims if we develop learning programs for our children the next generation.
By backing our project, you will support the development of next generation Zero-Carbon emission hotels and agree teaching the children can preserve the nature, because our children can make decisions over things will bring forth the sustainability.

We will keep you updated with our progress and deeply appreciate your contribution. Thank you!

You will get a numbered Certificate with your name in pdf format once you support our idea and help us to go live with locally threatened plant saving program included the PureBalaton project.

Collection of Hungarian wildflower seeds is perfect for any meadow garden. We send you by post once you decide to support us in that way. The package contains 6 types of flowers in a packet which is garnished with Hungarian folk motifs.

Recognized as a ‘PureBalaton’ sponsor. Meet and engage with Team, local product manufacturers and entrepreneurs! Be interviewed and get published on the PureBalaton website! All other perks included.

Recognized as a ‘PureBalaton’ partner sponsor. Spend the most interesting weekend of your life by visiting the Lake Balaton, the biggest lake in Europe where the prototype Zero-Carbon Eco Resort will be built. You will be accompanied by the founders and arranging valuable conversations with environment protection experts. Because it's just you and nature, we give you the most unbelievable and memorable experience ever. You can try in the top quality natural thermal baths too! You'll tell this story over and over, and remember this day for the rest of your life! It is for two person only, local transport from the airport and accommodations are arranged by us and are included. All other perks are also included.

You want to help, but may not be able to do it financially? No problem, there are a number of ways to help with this initiative, one of the first is to get the word out. Every time you share this campaign with others, you help to seed this idea. Share with your friends, co-workers, social media followers, wherever and whoever you can think of. Help us spread the word about what PureBalaton is planning, and don't forget Indiegogo has awesome share tools to help spread the message as well. If you have opportunity PRESS FOR OUR PROJECT, here is the fine print.
Thank you so much for sharing PureBalaton with your community!

No business comes without risk, but the best way to mitigate that risk is to plan the project carefully. This is exactly what we’re going to do, leveraging the success of this PureBalaton project we raised Indiegogo campaign to fund acquisition of the best and brightest minds to move forward, be it partnerships with environmental experts, hospitality consultant and architect designer.

Q: Why should I support European plant conservation project if my country of residence is out of Europe?

A: Plants are universally recognized as a vital component of the world's biological diversity and an essential resource for the planet. Cultivated and wild plants across the globe are used to provide foods, medicine, fuel, shelter, decoration and materials for construction. So too, plants provide an array of ecosystems services, generating oxygen, sequestering carbon, reducing soil erosion to name but a few of the vital actions performed. Saving the biological diversity can be effective and successful only with worldwide unity and actions, regardless of where we live, we are part of the same ecosystem.


Q: Which threatened species planned to be conserved in PureBalaton Botanic garden?

A: We plan to save and restore native deciduous trees, shrubs and wildflower meadows according to local plant conserving strategy aimed to be prepared from your donation.


Q: Is there any similar Eco Resort in Hungary with plant conservation and restoration program?
A: No, this is a completely new idea, and yet there is no similar Eco Hotels in Hungary and Central Europe, either.


Q: What happens to my money once I have donated?
A: The money will be put into a secure trust account and only used for the purpose of proceed this project.


Q: Is my donation tax deductible? 
A: Unfornatelly not, we are not a registered charity.


Q: What are PureBalaton plans for the far future? 
A: Our long term goal is Pure’YOURDESTINATION’ Eco Resort being a global brand with franchises all over the world providing tourists with all the advantages that has made franchise chains of a super Hospitality brand so successful, a recognizable brand, design, high quality service, marketing, social media presence. In addition our garden will be used for research and educational activities to proactively promote the development of other seed saving organisation, community groups and train future heritage gardeners and guardians.
story_txt:
The potential impacts of growth on the environment, along with factors such as global climate change, have become particularly hot topics within the travel and tourism industry today. In order to launch our idea as a Startup enterprise we examined the relationship between the governing principles of Green tourism and environment protection, along with predictable trends in the future. 

The PureBalaton Eco Resort concept consists of 12 gorgeous thatched-roof residences and they are intended to open during the Summer of 2018. Each of the Eco residences will be a one-story structure with a small swimming pool located on the terrace. The living area will consist of six to eight beds, a living room, small kitchen and bath area. Within the resort, the main building will be placed facing a private lake and it will facilitate all common services like reception, restaurant, cafeteria and lobby. The Eco residences will feature excellent views of the surrounding landscape, including the charming turquoise lake Balaton. The parking area will be covered with solar panels serving as the energy supply of the Eco Resort. 


The PureBalaton Eco Resort is designed to put visitors in direct contact with nature by minimizing both the visual and environmental impact on the landscape with low-profile structures. 

We will accomplish a Green operation program and Green  purchasing policy to save as much as waste and energy is possible applying the current innovation.

We will combine the highest standards of hospitality, smart technologies, renewable energy sources to reach sustainable zero carbon emission operations with an affordable luxury guest experience. We will design and develop the first self-managing hotel system for various operations, which will serve our guests' convenience and greatly reduce energy consumption.
As global trends are trickling into the hospitality industry the smart technologies, mobile apps, ultra-personalized services and self-managing systems become essential. The concept of luxury seems to revise itself as exclusivity becomes fashionable. However the availability of new information technology not only allows for convenience, but it also helps in the optimization of energy consumption, which is an important factor for an Eco Resort such as PureBalaton. Thus some global trends allowed by advanced technologies may play together well with environment-friendly practices.

 
Garden guide system - The Interactive Botanical Garden
The people use traditional navigational signs for their everyday routes like roads, traffic signs, buildings, different maps. Today we have an easy way to get from A point to B point because the traditional signs and SMART tools help us. We feel safe when traveling and during navigation. But how do we feel our self in the nature? Without the conventional navigational signs? Most of us feel lost and uncomfortable, isn’t it?We have the knowledge for keeping the people feel safe when they are in nature far from the ordinary navigational signs. And more... Our idea supports our safety and give information about the nature surrounds us.

 
There are only a few option exists for real Zero-Carbon hotels when they choose a management system for its operation. These game changer hotels seriously consider emerging technologies like SMART tools, mobile, IoT, assets collaboration, big data should, predictive operation, energy management but these functions mostly missing from the current management systems. Now it is time to develop a new supporting tool, a totally new infrastructure for Zero-Carbon Eco hotels because these enabling green technologies can give us more advantages when collaboration each-other, operating on the highest level of synergies.








Pursuing green practices in a hotel operation is a win-win situation because we can reduce operational costs while also reducing harmful impacts on the environment.

According to our expectations and reports illustrated in the topic

Energy and water consumption costs may be reduced by more than 30 %
Carbon emission may be reduced by 35% due to the available and currently applied green technologies moreover implementing 14 ha (34 ac) botanical garden - can absorb 176 ton (388 th lb) Carbon Dioxide -  we can achieve carbon neutral operation; more info: http://www.purebalaton.com/project/market-overview

Waste water disposal costs can be decreased around 40 %
Solid waste will reduce significantly by 70% thanks to local purchase concept
Staff motivation, employee retention and community relations will be improved
We may benefit from higher customer loyalty
Gaining competitive advantage by being a leader in the sector, increased brand value

story:
We have moved to generosity.com: https://igg.me/at/UJv-XclLquY


THE GAIA PROJECT -
A WILDLIFE SANCTUARY IN AFRICA

This project isn’t your typical charity fundraiser...you will be taking part in a global project to preserve animals and their habitats from human intervention by buying a piece of the land they live on - shared equally by a collective group of nature lovers. 1 share per person (ruffly 1 Square Meter will be officially yours).

The Basic Plan

Each circle represents  1 share... each person who buys a share will fill one of the gaps and essentially own the land with the rest of the shareholders, though it is truly owned by the animals and plants.

We will be partners on this journey...a team of animal lovers protecting the world and its wildlife.

Land is very highly priced and only the very wealthy can afford them...very often this results in luxury hunting lodges and large hotels being built over the beautiful landscape and interrupting the tranquillity and natural state of the land and wildlife. By owning the land and securing the sanctuary with fences and security, we can keep hunters & poachers away from the animals.



We aim to build a sanctuary for wildlife and protect nature, so that life can thrive...


...If 1 Million people chipped in £6-$10 each we could own and protect the sanctuary together as a collective. This will insure the protection of land and animals from poaching, hunting, lodging etc and we can all share in the beautiful bounty of african wildlife. 

You will be treated as honoured guests and friends of the land... we await to see your face's light up at the site of our collective creation and to embark on this magnificent journey together.

Once all money has been raised and the sanctuary is officially paid for, each one of you who has bought a share will receive a Share Certificate. This is your "Key" to enter the sanctuary and will authenticate your ownership of a piece of the land.... certifying you with the right to visit the preserve, interact with the animals and share in its breathtaking beauty.

I hope to list everyones name on our founders wall to commemorate each persons participation and to show my gratitude for making this a reality.



Over 500 endangered plants & 300 species of animals will be protected in the sanctuary including Impala, Zebra, Leopard, Lion, Waterbuck, Kudu, Giraffe, Brown hyena, Hedgehog, Lesser bush baby, Sable, Elephant, African Buffalo, Rhino, Vervet monkey, Yellow mongoose, African wild cat, Rock rabbit, Porcupine, Ant bear, Pangolin etc...free to roam the land under protection.

I will be managing the project throughout to ensure the land and animals are well cared for and to guarantee the preservation of life within the sanctuary. The theme of this project is unity and preservation - the sanctuary is always open to you and details of its location will be shared with you once we have confirmed the sale.



"Alone a pebble makes a ripple, together we make a wave"

Each person is allowed 1 share and can choose between £6 > to donate.

We are dedicated nature lovers - Protecting wildlife from around the world...preserving and nurturing life so that it will flourish once again. 

For more information contact Michael at:
mkppapadakis@hotmail.com


1 MILLION PEOPLE... 

1 MILLION SHARES...


1 SANCTUARY.


IF WE DO NOT REACH 1MILLION WE WILL CONSIDER DOWNSIZING THE PROJECT TO A SMALLER PRESERVE. WE WILL HAVE TO REACH A MINIMUM OF £50,000 TO DO THIS...IF WE DO NOT REACH $50,000 ALL DONATIONS WILL BE REFUNDED SO THERE ARE NO DISAPPOINTMENTS.
CERTIFICATES WILL BE SENT OUT ONCE ALL HAVE BEEN SOLD.

Thank you to all the animal lovers for standing up for those without a voice...with or without a donation we love you and hope that you find what you seek in this life.
All the best, Michael K.P

story:
Our company, CARE, was founded in 2010 as a spin off of the University of Perugia, Italy. Our mission is to make easier to be green. With our green products we share and disseminate our educational message for the environment.

CareBag is an assembly kit for a bag and accessories entirely made with natural materials: natural felt, olive wood, hemp string. You can also buy assembly kits for accessories (mobile case, tablet case, wallet and multifunction purse). Make your own bag!  It is not just a bag, but a container of good practices and environmental sensibility. It is easy to assemble, easy to carry, simple and beautiful as the nature surrounding us. The main features of CareBag are: Eco-sustainability, Do It Yourself, Customization, Educational value.

Our market choices affect our Planet. If we choose CareBag instead of another bag we are paying more attention to the environment.  

You can help us to make a difference. Be part of our project. All together we can make a difference!

 

CareBag is an assembly kit for an eco sustainable bag, with customizable assembly paths, created by a green designer. Main features:  

  • Green Product: high quality, 100% eco sustainable and natural.  
  • Do it yourself: simple and fun product to assemble.  
  • Customization: alternative assembly paths, and creation of customized accessories.  
  • Educational value: a small booklet will be provided, with a strong scientific basis that will show the environmental advantages of the kit, useful also for taking notes.

Buying online a CareBag, a customer receives at home a package with components to be assembled, 100% natural and eco sustainable. Different options allow for a customization of the bag. The kit, besides the bag, may include several accessories, described in the following. You can buy the bag only, the bag with all the accessories, which is the “Deluxe” kit, or the accessories alone.

With CareBag, let also fashion be green, and especially available for all!

 

 

Body of the bag: they are outlines in felt, made with natural wool only, in three different colors (brown, light brown, white), corresponding to the different fleece of the sheeps. The felt contains vegetable fibers. No chemical additive or colorant is present. This material, produced in Italy, was chosen because the wool is often considered a waste, since its use in the textile industry is continuosly decreasing for economic reasons. The outlines are already bunched and ready for easy assembly.

Inserts in olive wood: they are several accessories (buckles, buttons, bottom of the bag, a pendant) made of Italian olive wood, coming not from the cutting of trees, but from the annual pruning.  

Material for stitching: Natural hemp, product by the enormous potential  gone into disuse, but which during past years has supported the Italian agricultural economy. Its reintroduction is therefore desirable.

Needles: in the kit two needles in olive wood are included. 

Booklet: in the kit there is also a booklet made of recycled paper. It has a cover in natural felt and tying in hemp yarn. Inside are some explanatory pages, with a strong scientific basis, but easy to read, showing the benefits for the environment related to this alternative form of trade, and the relationships with climate change. In the booklet there are also some blank pages for taking notes.

Accessories: The Deluxe kit, besides the bag, includes a number of accessories, sold separately too, to be assembled: Tablet Case, Mobile Case, Multifunction Purse, Wallet. 

 

Packaging: The shipping box is free of glue and made of certified PEFC cardboard.

Customization: there are different options of customization. In particular, the customer can choose to use different buttons, other from the ones supplied by us, recycling old bags or dresses, or can add little pendants to the bag, making her/his personalized CareBag. Moreover, within the kit we provide an additional shoulder strap and an additional outline for the front of the bag, in white felt. You can color the white felt and /or the hemp string, available in the kit, with several natural materials (e.g. turmeric for yellow, turnip for pink) or with food colorants. In this way, the customer can choose if having some of the pieces of the bag in brown, or white, or other colors. All the tips and instructions for coloring are contained in our booklet, that will be provided together with the assembly kit. 

  

Assembling CareBag and all the accessories is not difficult at all, because all the outlines in felt are already bunched! Basically, you just have to insert the thread in the designated holes.

The assembly of the bag takes about one hour and a half, while the assembly of each accessory takes about half an hour. Moreover, we prepared step by step video instructions in which every single step is explained in details.

 

 

And following, just one of the video instructions for the accessories. You can watch all them on our YouTube channel.

MOBILE CASE

 
 
 

   

CIRCULAR ECONOMY, the foundation of this project, is closely related to the concept of sustainable development, based on the idea of an economic system designed to regenerate itself, and on the creation of a sustainable production system that transforms or reuses materials previously wasted into goods and products with an economic value. 

 

The basic concept of the project is expressed through the following simple key words:  

  • Self-production (do it yourself): defined as the new sustainable road of design. The self-production is related to the concept of hand-crafted and artisan production, based not on the speed of industry, but on the duration of action.  
  • Modularity: You can add pieces, they are good alone or as a part of a set.
  • Open source: the project idea is a form of Open source around people and their objects, where the factory is a social, territorial, entrepreneurial pattern composed of studios, small artisans laboratories, using internet as commercial channel. This represents a "slow" model of consumption; the price of the product is built through a pact of equity between those who design, those who produce, those who distribute and consumers.

This project is the accomplishment of a "multi skill concept", a production process where the capabilities and contributions of all actors in the supply chain (designers, makers, web community, customers) are put together to arrive at the final product. The product is complete and assumes its final configuration thanks to the final customer, who can customize it; he knows that his product is a unique piece, because is not the result of an industrialized process, but of a self-production. 

 

 

Our project is planet-friendly, as we explained before. However, we cannot avoid shipping your perks! We will compensate the CO2 emissions due to shipping with the planting of trees in a plot of land of our property. ONE PERK ONE TREE! 

Periodically, we will publish on our Facebook page photos of the trees planted.

If you choose the perk "One week in Umbria, the green heart of Italy", you will see the plantation. The field is just around the country house were you will stay.

 

  • People sensitive to the environmental message  
  • People who like the do-it-yourself or want to accept the challenge  
  • People who like useful objects and design  
  • People having a shop such as pub, etc., to organize groups for sharing the experience of assembling the bag 

FOR EVERYBODY WANTS TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE  

 

  • For business  
  • For leisure  
  • For naturalists  
  • For families  
  • For hobbies
  • For funny
  • For whatever you love

CAREBAG IS A MULTITASKING BAG!  

 

We are a small company, we worked mostly on services for greening the world. This is our first product. Right now we have the complete prototype, we know where to get materials, everything is ready for production. We are asking for your support to start our production.  We carefully calculated how much funding we need to start a level of production that can allow us to remain on the market and in the short term to begin also the production of other models of the bag. The environmental commitment involves some higher than normal costs, but we think this is right, we really want to make a difference.

According to our business plan, we will use about 40% of our funding goal for the raw materials, another 20% for packaging and shipping, 15% fixed costs, 15% services, about 10% for Indiegogo fees.

If we will overcome the goal, we will begin also the production of other models of the bag.

 

Three things to remember about your perks:

 

For every perk you will receive, we will plant a tree!

 

2) 

If you want, you can color the white felt and /or the hemp string, available in the kit, with several natural materials. We'll give you all the tips and instructions for coloring. It'easy and eco-friendly!

 

 

 

 

 

€ 15 - For you, the video of a special recipe: how Angela cooks her great sauce made with organic ingredients related to our bag: pecorino (typical Italian sheep cheese), olive oil and mint. It will be sent you by email.

Watch the demo!

 

 

Before you pledge for the country house perks, please contact Antonio on skype: antonio.boggia, you will get more info and details.

 

As future developments of our project, we intend:

  1. to produce DIY bags in other shapes (shopper, backpack) and other natural materials;
  2. to sell a certain amount of bags already made, and assembled by communities or associations involved with socially useful work (e.g. phisically, economically or educationally disadvantaged persons).

 

CARE was founded in 2010 as a spin off of the University of Perugia, Italy. That’s why we have a scientific approach in our production, always seeking for eco-innovation. Our mission is to make easier to be green. For five years we have been a service company. Chameleon is a brand by CARE. That's why our symbol is the chameleon. Chameleon is committed to Ecoevents, Ecomanagement and, starting from 2015, Ecocommerce. It means that we are starting with the CareBag project to provide green products also. But ours are not products only. With our products we want to keep to share and disseminate our educational message for the environment.

 

 

 

Even if you can’t contribute directly, this doesn’t mean that you can’t help us. If you like our project, if you trust in us, you can make some noise about our campaign. Please, share, spread, tell to your friends, or to people potentially interested. This is another good way to be part of our project.

 

Despite this is a new project, we are confident that we have taken all the actions necessary to start the production, but.... we won't be able to make this happen without your support! 
Of course, all businesses face risks and challenges, but we have tried to minimize them. 
This is not just an idea, we have a complete working prototype for the CareBag. We built CareBag over time. Continuous improvement is our key word. We have just changed some supply strategy and as a result we were able to reduce the selling price of 20%. The box only might slightly change in size and shape in the final version. For this reason we believe that there is no risk of the product not fulfilling our expectations, in terms of quality, shape, cost, environmental impact. The supply chain is minimized, because we have a potential substitute supplier for each raw material. We also can exclude our management problems, since manufacturing is based in one place only, just close to our company headquarter,  our eco-designer will follow personally the production, and we trust in this project becoming a success. We are ready for mass production.

Our company, CARE, was founded in 2010 as a spin off of the University of Perugia, Italy. Our mission is to make easier to be green. With our green products we share and disseminate our educational message for the environment.
CareBag is an assembly kit for a bag and accessories entirely made with natural materials: natural felt, olive wood, hemp string. You can also buy assembly kits for accessories (mobile case, tablet case, wallet and multifunction purse). Make your own bag!  It is not just a bag, but a container of good practices and environmental sensibility. It is easy to assemble, easy to carry, simple and beautiful as the nature surrounding us. The main features of CareBag are: Eco-sustainability, Do It Yourself, Customization, Educational value.

Our market choices affect our Planet. If we choose CareBag instead of another bag we are paying more attention to the environment.  
You can help us to make a difference. Be part of our project. All together we can make a difference!
 

CareBag is an assembly kit for an eco sustainable bag, with customizable assembly paths, created by a green designer. Main features:  


Green Product: high quality, 100% eco sustainable and natural.  

Do it yourself: simple and fun product to assemble.  

Customization: alternative assembly paths, and creation of customized accessories.  

Educational value: a small booklet will be provided, with a strong scientific basis that will show the environmental advantages of the kit, useful also for taking notes.

Buying online a CareBag, a customer receives at home a package with components to be assembled, 100% natural and eco sustainable. Different options allow for a customization of the bag. The kit, besides the bag, may include several accessories, described in the following. You can buy the bag only, the bag with all the accessories, which is the “Deluxe” kit, or the accessories alone.
With CareBag, let also fashion be green, and especially available for all!
 

 

Body of the bag: they are outlines in felt, made with natural wool only, in three different colors (brown, light brown, white), corresponding to the different fleece of the sheeps. The felt contains vegetable fibers. No chemical additive or colorant is present. This material, produced in Italy, was chosen because the wool is often considered a waste, since its use in the textile industry is continuosly decreasing for economic reasons. The outlines are already bunched and ready for easy assembly.

Inserts in olive wood: they are several accessories (buckles, buttons, bottom of the bag, a pendant) made of Italian olive wood, coming not from the cutting of trees, but from the annual pruning.  

Material for stitching: Natural hemp, product by the enormous potential  gone into disuse, but which during past years has supported the Italian agricultural economy. Its reintroduction is therefore desirable.
Needles: in the kit two needles in olive wood are included. 
Booklet: in the kit there is also a booklet made of recycled paper. It has a cover in natural felt and tying in hemp yarn. Inside are some explanatory pages, with a strong scientific basis, but easy to read, showing the benefits for the environment related to this alternative form of trade, and the relationships with climate change. In the booklet there are also some blank pages for taking notes.
Accessories: The Deluxe kit, besides the bag, includes a number of accessories, sold separately too, to be assembled: Tablet Case, Mobile Case, Multifunction Purse, Wallet. 

 
Packaging: The shipping box is free of glue and made of certified PEFC cardboard.

Customization: there are different options of customization. In particular, the customer can choose to use different buttons, other from the ones supplied by us, recycling old bags or dresses, or can add little pendants to the bag, making her/his personalized CareBag. Moreover, within the kit we provide an additional shoulder strap and an additional outline for the front of the bag, in white felt. You can color the white felt and /or the hemp string, available in the kit, with several natural materials   (e.g. turmeric for yellow, turnip for pink) or with food colorants. In this way, the customer can choose if having some of the pieces of the bag in brown, or white, or other colors. All the tips and instructions for coloring are contained in our booklet, that will be provided together with the assembly kit. 


  
Assembling CareBag and all the accessories is not difficult at all, because all the outlines in felt are already bunched! Basically, you just have to insert the thread in the designated holes.
The assembly of the bag takes about one hour and a half, while the assembly of each accessory takes about half an hour. Moreover, we prepared step by step video instructions in which every single step is explained in details.
 


 
And following, just one of the video instructions for the accessories. You can watch all them on our YouTube channel.

story:
Food Lover's don't go hungry while staying at a hotel, just stay at Farr Hotels & Resorts and order your delicious meals.

You should have delicious food on your mind because we will certainly entice your stomach with all types of over the top seafood entrees from:

Black’n Salmon (served with dirty rice and steamed vegetables).

Black’n Mahi (served with dirty rice and steamed vegetables). Grilled Salmon (served with dirty rice and steamed vegetables).

Grilled Tilapia (served with dirty rice).

Grilled Snapper (served with dirty rice).

Fried Catfish Dinner overflowing with fries with Shrimp included.

With Delicious Toppings Like:

Black’n oysters, mushrooms, and crawfish tails in spiced lemon garlic butter sauce.

Shrimp, spinach, crawfish tails, and mushrooms in Monterrey Jack cheese sauce.

Shrimp and crawfish tails in wine-lemon garlic butter sauce.

Shrimp, mushrooms, and crawfish tails in white wine cream cheese sauce.

Shrimp, crawfish tails, and fresh sliced avocados in a creamy American cheese basil sauce.

Don't forget about the Steak seared to perfection with a plenty portion Caesar Salad and more.... 

The only hotel & resort that will have you coming back for the food and excellent service. Our hotels will provide award winning seasoned food, yoga , fashion, technology, health awareness, music, business events and wellness education which is loaded with nutritionist food. "Let's help the world and create better food together."

Established in April, 2018., Farr Hotels & Resorts is an Eco Friendly Hotel & Resort, whose mission is to transform economy hotels into Eco Friendly 4 Star Luxury Hotels & Resorts that serve the most awesome food on the menu. Over the past few months, Farr Hotels & Resorts has been identifying and researching hospitality properties that could be added to the roster with value added improvements.

We are in need of your support to continue our work. Think about how delicious the food would taste knowing that you are directly and indirectly supporting / backing this "Food Lover" Campaign.

I would like to introduce you to the founder. I am Ken Farr, Founder & CEO of Farr Hotels & Resorts. As CEO Ken Farr leads the company’s strategic, executive and managerial efforts for acquiring real estate properties like motels, hotels and multifamily. His 25 years of construction improvements (and new construction) of residential, commercial properties including hotels, motels, multifamily and residential gives him a special expertise when it comes to improving / upgrading property. Ken Farr also served 3 years for the City of Dallas as a Board Member for The Permit and License Appeal Board that was responsible for overseeing building permits, zoning citations and city ordinance violations. 

As you can see, Ken has the experience to improve hotels and resorts which will improve the overall reduction in carbon footprint impact to the earth.

Farr Hotels & Resorts aims to be different from the rest of our competitors by seeking out the freshest seafood prepared daily with the utmost care in mind by some of the best chefs in the industry. We will also track energy usage from the beginning of the hotel acquisition until 30%  reduction in energy usage is achieved as a bonus.  In addition, we plan to upgrade all of our internal equipment, which includes appliances from HVAC to water-filtration systems and beyond, to high-quality levels.

Farr Hotels & Resorts Food Lover Campaign is very important to us because we are focused on disrupting the $500 Billion hotel and resort market by integrating more food that is easily prepared, healthier while developing some of the most sought after meals provided by our wonderful guest chefs. Farr Hotels & Resorts Founder, Ken Farr, has always believed in better food and preserving the Earth while also providing a better customer experience to hotel customers.

As a contributor(s), you will help us acquire hotels in Arkansas, Texas, Chicago, Atlanta, and other desirable locations that can benefit from our Food Lover transformation and soften the negative image on the hospitality market by participating. Every Farr Hotels & Resorts you see will make you smile because you played a very significant part in bringing this campaign to the masses with your generous contributions.

Farr Hotels & Resorts Needs Are:

We Need $1.8 million to purchase our first hospitality property located in Arkansas.

  • We are seeking $30,000.00 (first phase) to develop and enhance our meals.
  • $1.8 million (second phase) will be used to buy our first hotel including marketing, construction restaurant improvements, hire chefs, upgrades, working capital, hiring  employees, taxes & legal fees, aggressive digital marketing / advertising campaigns that target business / casual travelers including the Millennial's. 

 

                                                                     Perks

  • Everyone — Frequent updates on our Food Lover Menu progress.

    $100.00+ ---- A free drink (non alcoholic) and a meal including 1 night stay (Standard Room) at Farr Hotels &  Resorts (upon development).

    $500.00+ — A free drink (non alcoholic) and a meal including 2 nights stay (Standard Room) at Farr Hotels & Resorts (upon development). 

    $1,000+ — A free drink and a meal including 2 nights stay (Queen) at Farr Hotels & Resorts (upon development).

    $2,000+ — A free drink, meal and 3 nights stay (Queen) at Farr Hotels & Resorts (upon development).

    $3,000+ — A free drink, breakfast, lunch & dinner meal and 4 nights stay (Queen or King) at Farr Hotels & Resorts (upon development).

    $5,000+ — A free drink, breakfast, lunch & dinner meal and 5 nights (Queen or King) stay at Farr Hotels & Resorts (upon development).

    $10,000+ — A free exclusive dinner with a meet and greet the founder of the Farr Hotels & Resorts Hotel, 7 individual hotel nights stay (Suite), 1 weekend stay at a Farr Hotels and Resorts property with 5 drinks included (upon development).

    $50,000+ --- A free exclusive dinner with a meet and greet the founder of the Farr Hotels & Resorts Eco Friendly Luxury Chain, an Honorary Plaque on the lobby wall, 10 individual hotel nights stay (Suite), 3 weekend stay at a Farr Hotels and Resorts property with 10 drinks included with a free Farr Hotels & Resorts Custom Robe (upon development).

     $100,000+ --- Everything included at the $50,000+ level, plus VIP Invite to the Official Grand Opening (upon development).

    *All perks occur after the offering is completed, and upon completion of development.  No hotels currently exist. 

  • The funds will go to opening a corporate office, identifying, selecting (phase 1.) and closing on a smaller hotel if we do not reach our entire campaign goal (phase 2.) and / or securing additional business loans to raise the additional amount necessary to purchase our select hospitality property.

The Impact:

Farr Hotels & Resorts is a startup aiming to disrupt the $500 Billion Hospitality Industry, while also helping to improve the food and menus that are available at hotels throughout the country. 

Many if not all of you have stayed in a hotel during your life. Very few of you have probably stopped to think about how bad the environmental impact of these hotels can be. Now you have the opportunity to reduce the impact in Eco-friendly hotel development that is not only earth friendly, but family friendly as well. 

Farr Hotels & Resorts will work extremely hard to become the world leader in better hotel food.

Help us reach our goal, and help make the world a taster place.

  • Our Food Lover Project is very valuable to the contributor(s) because everyone must eat whether you like salads or you are a vegan to live. The world benefits immensely because a penny earned is a penny saved (energy earned is energy saved) (“A penny saved is a penny earned?” is a quote which is attributed to Benjamin Franklin, one of the most famous Americans of his and our time.. 
  • Ken has a very successful track record from developing single family projects to construction improvements of commercial / residential projects in several cities along with over 500 sub-contractors.
  • Support us and we will support you with every location we acquire.

Risks & Challenges:

There are risks associated with these projects such as a larger hospitality competitor(s) entering this exciting improved fresh food market and delays by food suppliers(s) including suppliers, equipment and services - but, we feel the benefits certainly outweigh the risks that could be associated with any industries (there also, could be delays in product shipping and delivery from suppliers).

  • Here is what qualifies us to overcome these hurdles by strategically selecting the best hotels that can be transformed quicker and studying the market as to offset any change(s) or fluctuations that may be foreseeable as well as unforeseeable.
  • My plan is to utilize my over 25 years of experience to solve these challenges by keeping on schedule, hiring the most effective experienced employees, implementing strong quality assurance and evaluating better solutions to improve our hospitality market including integrating state of the art software with marketing analytics.

How We Intend To Use Your Donations:

  • Acquire or manage our first hotel while transforming the restaurant customer experience.
  • Legal expenses (legal Fees, legal documentation and accounting).
  • Sourcing and identifying new menus including onsite visits.
  •  Advertising & Marketing - To raise awareness via media such as TV and radio segments, press release, digital marketing, email marketing / brochures, 30 seconds commercials published in online / offline and various newspapers/ magazines.
  •  Coordination and hosting meetings with brokers and all relevant parties.
  • Regular press conferences
  • Regular public appearances including trade shows.
  • Print media - Brochures/ Catalogues.
  • Promotional videos with direct email marketing.

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

If you are not able to contribute, how about retweeting, sharing or posting our information on social media website(s):

  • Ask your family and friends everywhere to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

  • We know it’s not always easy to contribute financially, and that’s completely fine. You can still help us by just spreading the word! Reach out to people who you might think is interested in supporting our cause. You can also use the Indiegogo platform to promote this campaign with friends, family, and on social media networks. Hope this didn’t take up much of your time and a big thank you for all the support!

    For more information on FHR and what we do, visit https://farrhotelsresorts.com

Can’t contribute but would love to get involved?

Drop us an email at contact@farrhotelsresorts.com

Looking for more information or have a question?

We will also track energy usage from the beginning of the hotel acquisition until 30%  reduction in energy usage is achieved as a bonus.  In addition, we plan to upgrade all of our internal equipment, which includes appliances from HVAC to water-filtration systems and beyond, to high-quality levels.
Farr Hotels & Resorts Food Lover Campaign is very important to us because we are focused on disrupting the $500 Billion hotel and resort market by integrating more food that is easily prepared, healthier while developing some of the most sought after meals provided by our wonderful guest chefs. Farr Hotels & Resorts Founder, Ken Farr, has always believed in better food and preserving the Earth while also providing a better customer experience to hotel customers.
As a contributor(s), you will help us acquire hotels in Arkansas, Texas, Chicago, Atlanta, and other desirable locations that can benefit from our Food Lover transformation and soften the negative image on the hospitality market by participating. Every Farr Hotels & Resorts you see will make you smile because you played a very significant part in bringing this campaign to the masses with your generous contributions.

Farr Hotels & Resorts Needs Are:
We Need $1.8 million to purchase our first hospitality property located in Arkansas.

We are seeking $30,000.00 (first phase) to develop and enhance our meals.
$1.8 million (second phase) will be used to buy our first hotel including marketing, construction restaurant improvements, hire chefs, upgrades, working capital, hiring  employees, taxes & legal fees, aggressive digital marketing / advertising campaigns that target business / casual travelers including the Millennial's. 

 
                                                                     Perks


Everyone — Frequent updates on our Food Lover Menu progress.
$100.00+ ---- A free drink (non alcoholic) and a meal including 1 night stay (Standard Room) at Farr Hotels &  Resorts (upon development).
$500.00+ — A free drink (non alcoholic) and a meal including 2 nights stay (Standard Room) at Farr Hotels & Resorts (upon development). 
$1,000+ — A free drink and a meal including 2 nights stay (Queen) at Farr Hotels & Resorts (upon development).
$2,000+ — A free drink, meal and 3 nights stay (Queen) at Farr Hotels & Resorts (upon development).
$3,000+ — A free drink, breakfast, lunch & dinner meal and 4 nights stay (Queen or King) at Farr Hotels & Resorts (upon development).
$5,000+ — A free drink, breakfast, lunch & dinner meal and 5 nights (Queen or King) stay at Farr Hotels & Resorts (upon development).
$10,000+ — A free exclusive dinner with a meet and greet the founder of the Farr Hotels & Resorts Hotel, 7 individual hotel nights stay (Suite), 1 weekend stay at a Farr Hotels and Resorts property with 5 drinks included (upon development).
$50,000+ --- A free exclusive dinner with a meet and greet the founder of the Farr Hotels & Resorts Eco Friendly Luxury Chain, an Honorary Plaque on the lobby wall, 10 individual hotel nights stay (Suite), 3 weekend stay at a Farr Hotels and Resorts property with 10 drinks included with a free Farr Hotels & Resorts Custom Robe (upon development).
 $100,000+ --- Everything included at the $50,000+ level, plus VIP Invite to the Official Grand Opening (upon development).
*All perks occur after the offering is completed, and upon completion of development.  No hotels currently exist. 

The funds will go to opening a corporate office, identifying, selecting (phase 1.) and closing on a smaller hotel if we do not reach our entire campaign goal (phase 2.) and / or securing additional business loans to raise the additional amount necessary to purchase our select hospitality property.


The Impact:
Farr Hotels & Resorts is a startup aiming to disrupt the $500 Billion Hospitality Industry, while also helping to improve the food and menus that are available at hotels throughout the country. 
Many if not all of you have stayed in a hotel during your life. Very few of you have probably stopped to think about how bad the environmental impact of these hotels can be. Now you have the opportunity to reduce the impact in Eco-friendly hotel development that is not only earth friendly, but family friendly as well. 
Farr Hotels & Resorts will work extremely hard to become the world leader in better hotel food.
Help us reach our goal, and help make the world a taster place.

Our Food Lover Project is very valuable to the contributor(s) because everyone must eat whether you like salads or you are a vegan to live. The world benefits immensely because a penny earned is a penny saved (energy earned is energy saved) (“A penny saved is a penny earned?” is a quote which is attributed to Benjamin Franklin, one of the most famous Americans of his and our time.. 
Ken has a very successful track record from developing single family projects to construction improvements of commercial / residential projects in several cities along with over 500 sub-contractors.
Support us and we will support you with every location we acquire.


Risks & Challenges:
There are risks associated with these projects such as a larger hospitality competitor(s) entering this exciting improved fresh food market and delays by food suppliers(s) including suppliers, equipment and services - but, we feel the benefits certainly outweigh the risks that could be associated with any industries (there also, could be delays in product shipping and delivery from suppliers).

Here is what qualifies us to overcome these hurdles by strategically selecting the best hotels that can be transformed quicker and studying the market as to offset any change(s) or fluctuations that may be foreseeable as well as unforeseeable.
My plan is to utilize my over 25 years of experience to solve these challenges by keeping on schedule, hiring the most effective experienced employees, implementing strong quality assurance and evaluating better solutions to improve our hospitality market including integrating state of the art software with marketing analytics.

How We Intend To Use Your Donations:

Acquire or manage our first hotel while transforming the restaurant customer experience.
Legal expenses (legal Fees, legal documentation and accounting).
Sourcing and identifying new menus including onsite visits.
 Advertising & Marketing - To raise awareness via media such as TV and radio segments, press release, digital marketing, email marketing / brochures, 30 seconds commercials published in online / offline and various newspapers/ magazines.
 Coordination and hosting meetings with brokers and all relevant parties.
Regular press conferences
Regular public appearances including trade shows.
Print media - Brochures/ Catalogues.
Promotional videos with direct email marketing.


 
Other Ways You Can Help:
If you are not able to contribute, how about retweeting, sharing or posting our information on social media website(s):

Ask your family and friends everywhere to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

We know it’s not always easy to contribute financially, and that’s completely fine. You can still help us by just spreading the word! Reach out to people who you might think is interested in supporting our cause. You can also use the Indiegogo platform to promote this campaign with friends, family, and on social media networks. Hope this didn’t take up much of your time and a big thank you for all the support!
For more information on FHR and what we do, visit https://farrhotelsresorts.com


Can’t contribute but would love to get involved?Drop us an email at contact@farrhotelsresorts.comLooking for more information or have a question?

story:
/leefzhempwear                                    /Leefz_Official                                      /leefz.official

Origin of Leefz Hempwear

About two years ago, Leefz was founded by three friends from The Netherlands to undertake action against one of the largest polluters in the world; the clothing industry. Leefz creates sustainable T-shirts from a material that has been used for centuries; hemp. Hemp fabric has many benefits like being naturally anti-bacterial, anti-microbial, breathable and it gets softer with every wash.

Traditional clothing is made from ordinary cotton and synthetic fabric which have huge negative impact on the environment. The clothing made from these fibers may be good for the profits of the major clothing brands but is devastating for the environment. Looking to make an alternative for ordinary clothing Leefz Hempwear was born.

Leefz Hempwear aims to be a pioneer in the sustainable clothing industry and wants to undertake action against the second largest polluter in the world.


Did you know ..

.. that one Leefz shirt will save

  • 700 liters of fresh water
  • 50% of CO2 emissions
  • 55% of harmful pesticides
  • 25% of land usage

This Adds Up. Our first 100pc collection only already saves 70.000 liters of water in comparison to a cotton t-shirt.

Where are we now?

After 2 years of research, samples and testing we discovered the best fit, feel and looks for our T-shirts. We have chosen a simplistic but beautiful design with the Leefz logo on the chest. The shirts are made from 55% hemp and 45% cotton. The hemp makes the shirt more sustainable, durable and tough. The cotton fiber is still needed to soften the fabric to keep the fabric nice and soft and to ensure a comfy fit.

Why Not 100% Hemp?

When Leefz started we aimed for 100% hemp, after receiving mutiple samples from multiple suppliers we found out that the shirt looses its softness and it can get very itchy. We found out that the blend of 55% hemp, 45% cotton gives the shirt a comfortable feel and fit.

This does not mean that Leefz is not searching for other ways to make the our shirt more sustainable. Currently we are looking into other materials like bamboo to blend with hemp to make our shirt even more environmental friendly! So... stay updated by subscribing to our newsletter on www.leefz.com

 

The goal of our designer is to keep the shirt simplistic but also unique. This is why you can wear our shirt as a casual shirt but the leaf on the chest indicates that it isn't just a shirt.... It's a Leefz shirt.

What We Need & What You Get

  • To realize our first collection of hemp T-shirts and keep things like our website up and running we need €2500. If we reach the goal of €2500, we will also launch a white hemp T-shirt with a black Leefz logo. 
  • If we don't reach our entire goal we still can ship out the black First Edition T-shirts but we will do it on a smaller scale. 
  • With €2500 our research on shirts with a higher percentage of hemp will go way faster. Our goal is to keep the comfort the shirt has now, but to use a higher percentage of hemp. 

​

Challenges

Because we already have a prototype the risks aren't really that big. Sadly, the current prototype isn't in the right colour so we can't show pictures of the finished product. A big challenge for us is the sizing of the shirts. Hemp T-shirts can shrink, giving adequate information about which size you should choose is key for succes.

The final product will be black with a white Leefz logo on the chest.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Help funding our campaign isn't the only way you can help. If you like the idea and want to support in another way we are very grateful if you share our project on your social media channels! And if you want to help in another way, contact us on our website!

Our socials: 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Leefz_Official
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/leefzhempwear
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/leefz.official/
Or subsribe to our newsletter here: https://www.leefz.com/

 

Thank you for your interest, please take a look at our perks and we hope to see you around on our site or on one of our social media pages!

 

Kind regards, 
The Leefz team

 

/leefzhempwear                                    /Leefz_Official                                      /leefz.official

story:
Backyard Aquaponics

Aquaponics  refers to any system that combines conventional aquaculture (raising aquatic animals such as snails, fish, crayfish or prawns in tanks) with hydroponics (cultivating plants in water) in a symbiotic environment.

My name is Chuck Conti and I am on a mission. A mission to make food production more local. (And what is more local than your own backyard?) To make our food safer, healthier and readily available. For the last four years I have watched, read and searched for any information I could find on growing hydroponically and now, aquaponically. I have had great success growing hydroponically with NFT, DWC,Aeroponic and Flood and Drain Hydroponic systems that I designed and built with the information I have discovered.

There is a great injustice facing us all. Food is produced in this country by large corporations with profit in mind and no regard as to what the effect will be on peoples health. Food production where the more chemicals used on our food, the more profit. A lot of our food production is now controlled by chemical companies and it is time that we say enough is enough. It is time to take more control over the foods we feed our families and not leave it in the hands of a profit hungry chemical company.

By contributing to my campaign you will be helping to change how the world eats. Thinking globally and acting locally.

Some of the problems with our current system:

  • 16 million American kids struggle with hunger each year.
  • An estimated 48.8 million Americans , including 16.2 million children, live in households that lack the means to get enough nutritious food on a regular basis.
  • It is estimated that the average American meal travels about 1500 miles to get from farm to plate. Why is this cause for concern? There are many reasons: This long-distance, large-scale transportation of food consumes large quantities of fossil fuels, requires foods to be picked before ripe reducing their nutritional value and requiring preservatives to be sprayed on them.
  • Between 500 and 1,000 insect and weed species have developed pesticide resistance since 1945 which means stronger and more chemicals need to be used.
  • Genetically modifying our foods is then required (with unknown consequences) so that they are more resistant to those chemicals, delivering more poisons to your table.

What We Need & What You Get

With this first fundraising experiment I am looking to raise $10,000. This will fund the perks I am offering and allow me to set up a prototype of the aquaponic system I have designed for the backyard, including a greenhouse for four season growing. This will be used to show the viability of a personal aquaponic systems and a sample to show homeowners what I can build for them. I will be donating half of all food grown in this system to the people who need it most. I will also be encouraging all clients to donate at least 10 percent of what they grow through the channels I develop with food banks, soup kitchens and others that provide food for the underfed.

You can take advantage of the perks I am offering to learn more about hydroponics and to start growing some healthy fresh food for you and your family.

Any money raised, up to $10,000 will be used for purposes mentioned above. Any amount will increase my ability to produce fresh vegetables and fish. If we raise more than $10,000 we will use it to begin to advertise, educate and build these gardens. 

The Impact

In Colonial America, agriculture was the primary livelihood for 90% of the population. Most farms were geared toward subsistence production for family use. Technology has created factory farming and chemical companies have gained control over our food supply.

Now with aquaponics technology we can bring back control over what we eat and be able to insure the food we feed our families is healthy, fresh and plentiful. We will reduce the proliferation of chemical pesticides and herbicides. We can greatly reduce the use of fossil fuels all while providing a healthier diet to our loved ones and the under "nutritioned". Healthy food should be a right and not a privilege. Help me to change what's for dinner

Risks & Challenges

People are creatures of habit. They expect to be able to go to the supermarket or have their food delivered to them and look for the most convenient way to provide for their families.

  • At age 48 I have finally found something that I am passionate about and will not quit until I have made a difference.
  • Together we will be able to make 0 mile, healthy food the more convenient choice while providing for others at the same time.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Help spread the word by sharing on your social media pages.
  • Like and follow us on Facebook. https://www.facebook.com/pvroots/

Thank you!

Together we will be able to make 0 mile, healthy food the more convenient choice while providing for others at the same time.


Other Ways You Can Help
